sub_fields.label: Gallery Images
sub_fields.name: gallery_images
sub_fields.instructions: Number of image should be 3 or 4 or 5 or 7. Layout of the gallery will be decided by the application based on the number of image count.

choices.career-department: Career Department Page ( Ex: Engineering, Product, Talent etc )
